original: Eriksson, Gustaf Bertil Augustin, komminister, Ljushult, Aplared, f. 30/ 11/07 i Åmål av kont: skriv. Erik E. o. Sigrid Claesson. G. 36 m. Elsa Larsson. Barn: Bo-Göran f. 41, Birgitta 46. — Stud:ex. i Vänersborg 26, teol. fil. ex. v. Gbgs högsk. 27, teol. kand. i Lund 32, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Gbgs stift 32. Past:adj. i Forshälla, v. kommin. å Käringön, past:adj. i Backa, v. pastor i Solberga o. i Tranemo, kommin. i Ljushult sed. 36. Ordf. i Ljushults kyrkostämma, v. ordf. i Ljushults barnav:nd, ordf. i Diakoniens vänner, ordf. o. kassör i direkt, f. Jakobssonska donationerna, kassör f. Sexdrega lönebo-stikassor o. prästlönekassa.
translated: Eriksson, Gustaf Bertil Augustin, minister, Ljushult, Aplared, born on November 30, 1907 in Åmål to civil servant Erik E. and Sigrid Claesson. Married in 1936 to Elsa Larsson, with children: Bo-Göran, born in 1941 and Birgitta born in 1946. He completed his secondary school education in Vänersborg in 1926, theologian fil. ex. at Gothenburg University in 1927, theologian kand. in Lund in 1932 and underwent practical theological training and was ordained as a priest in Gothenburg in 1932. He served as an assistant pastor in Forshälla, a deputy minister at Käringön, an assistant pastor in Backa, a pastor in Solberga and in Tranemo before becoming a minister in Ljushult in 1936. He was the chairman of Ljushult's church meeting, deputy chairman of Ljushult's child welfare committee, chairman of the Diakoniens vänner organization, chairman and treasurer of the Jakobssonska donations organization, treasurer for Sexdrega payroll-sti cash and the priest's salary fund.
